10   | #define CURSES_LIBRARY  1
11   | #define LOCAL_VAR
12   | 
13   | #include <stdio.h>
14   | #include <dos.h>
15   | #include <bios.h>
16   | #include <sys\movedata.h>
17   | #include "v_video.h"
18   | 
19   | SCREEN _cursvar = {0};      /* curses variables     */
20   | 
21   | WINDOW *curscr = NULL;            /* the current screen image */
22   | WINDOW *stdscr = NULL;            /* the default screen window    */
23   | 
24   | int _default_lines = 25;    /* default terminal height  */
25   | int LINES=0;            /* current terminal height  */
26   | int COLS=0;         /* current terminal width   */
27   | 
28   | /*+ Local prototypes +*/
29   | static int v_scr_open(SCREEN *internal, bool echo);
30   | 
31   | /*+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
32   | initscr()
33   | ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++*/
34   | WINDOW* initscr(void)
35   | {
36   |   register int i=0;
37   | 
38   |     /*--- Return if this function is already called before  */
39   |     if  (_cursvar.alive)
40   |         return( NULL);
41   | 
42   |     memset(&_cursvar, 0, sizeof(SCREEN));
43   | 
44   |     v_scr_open(&_cursvar, 0);
45   |     _cursvar.orig_cursor = _cursvar.cursor;
46   | /*  _cursvar.orig_font = PDC_get_font();*/
47   |     _cursvar.orig_font = _cursvar.font;
48   |     _cursvar.blank = ' ';
49   | 
50   | /*  LINES = v_get_rows();*/
51   | /*  COLS = v_get_columns(); */
52   |     LINES = _cursvar.lines;
53   |     COLS = _cursvar.cols;
54   |     if (LINES < 2 || COLS < 2)
55   |     {
56   |         fprintf( stderr, "initscr(): LINES=%d COLS=%d: too small.\n",LINES,COLS );
57   |         exit( 4 );
58   |     }
59   | 
60   | #ifdef SKIP_THIS_FOR_NOW
61   |     if ((curscr = newwin(LINES, COLS, 0, 0)) == (WINDOW *) NULL)
62   |     {
63   |         fprintf( stderr, "initscr(): Unable to create curscr.\n" );
64   |         exit( 2 );
65   |     }
66   |     if ((stdscr = newwin(LINES, COLS, 0, 0)) == (WINDOW *) NULL)
67   |     {
68   |         fprintf( stderr, "initscr(): Unable to create stdscr.\n" );
69   |         exit( 1 );
70   |     }
71   |     curscr->_clear = FALSE;
72   | #endif
73   | 
74   | #ifdef SKIP_THIS_FOR_NOW
75   |     v_init_atrtab(); /* set up default (BLACK on WHITE colours */
76   | #endif
77   | 
78   |     _cursvar.alive = TRUE;
79   | 
80   |     return( stdscr );
81   | }
82   | 
83   | /*+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
84   | 
85   | ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++*/
86   | int endwin(void)
87   | {
88   | #ifdef SKIP_THIS_FOR_NOW
89   |     PDC_scr_close();
90   | #endif
91   | 
92   |     if (_cursvar.orig_font != _cursvar.font)  /* screen has not been resized */
93   |         {
94   |         v_set_font(_cursvar.orig_font);
95   |         resize_screen(v_get_rows());
96   |         }
97   | 
98   |     _cursvar.visible_cursor = FALSE;    /* Force the visible cursor */
99   |     _cursvar.cursor = _cursvar.orig_cursor;
100  |     v_cursoron();
101  |     /*
102  |      * Position cursor so that the screen will not scroll until they hit
103  |      * a carriage return. Do this BEFORE delwin(curscr) as PDC_gotoxy() uses
104  |      * curscr.
105  |      */
106  |     v_gotoxy(v_get_rows() - 2, 0);
107  | 	/*
108  |     delwin(stdscr);
109  |     delwin(curscr);
110  | 	*/
111  |     stdscr = (WINDOW *)NULL;
112  |     curscr = (WINDOW *)NULL;
113  |     _cursvar.alive = FALSE;
114  | 
115  |     if (_cursvar.orig_font != _cursvar.font)  /* screen has not been resized */
116  |         reset_shell_mode();
117  | 
118  |     return( OK );
119  | }
120  | 
121  | /*+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
122  | 
123  | ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++*/
124  | int resize_screen(int nlines)
125  | {
126  |     WINDOW* tmp=NULL;
127  | 
128  |     switch (_cursvar.adapter)
129  |     {
130  |     case _EGACOLOR:
131  |         if (nlines >= 43)   v_set_font(_FONT8);
132  |         else                v_set_80x25();
133  |         break;
134  | 
135  |     case _VGACOLOR:
136  |         if  (nlines > 28)       v_set_font(_FONT8);
137  |         else    if (nlines > 25)    v_set_font(_FONT14);
138  |         else                v_set_80x25();
139  |         break;
140  | 
141  |     default:
142  |         break;
143  |     }
144  | 
145  |     _cursvar.lines = LINES = v_get_rows();
146  |     _cursvar.cols  = COLS  = v_get_columns();
147  | 
148  |     if (curscr->_pmaxy > LINES)
149  |     {
150  |         v_scroll(0, 0, curscr->_pmaxy - 1, COLS - 1, 0, _cursvar.orig_attr);
151  |     }
152  |     else
153  |     {
154  |         v_scroll(0, 0, LINES - 1, COLS - 1, 0, _cursvar.orig_attr);
155  |     }
156  |     if ((tmp = resize_window(curscr, LINES, COLS)) != (WINDOW *) NULL)
157  |     {
158  |         curscr = tmp;
159  |     }
160  |     else
161  |     {
162  |         return (ERR);
163  |     }
164  |     if ((tmp = resize_window(stdscr, LINES, COLS)) != (WINDOW *) NULL)
165  |     {
166  |         stdscr = tmp;
167  |         touchwin(stdscr);
168  |         wnoutrefresh(stdscr);
169  |     }
170  |     else
171  |     {
172  |         return (ERR);
173  |     }
174  |     return (OK);
175  | }
176  | 
177  | /*+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
178  | v_scr_open()	- Internal low-level binding to open the physical screen
179  | ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++*/
180  | static int v_scr_open(SCREEN *internal, bool echo)
181  | {
182  | 
183  | 	internal->orig_attr	 	 = 0;
184  | 	internal->orig_emulation = getdosmembyte (0x487);
185  | 	v_get_cursor_pos(&internal->cursrow, &internal->curscol);
186  | 	internal->direct_video	 = TRUE;	/* Assume that we can	      */
187  | 	internal->autocr		 = TRUE;	/* lf -> crlf by default      */
188  | 	internal->raw_out		 = FALSE;	/* tty I/O modes	      */
189  | 	internal->raw_inp		 = FALSE;	/* tty I/O modes	      */
190  | 	internal->cbreak		 = TRUE;
191  | 	internal->echo			 = echo;
192  | 	internal->refrbrk		 = TRUE;	/* allow premature end of refresh*/
193  | 	internal->video_seg		 = 0xb000;	/* Base screen segment addr   */
194  | 	internal->video_ofs		 = 0x0;		/* Base screen segment ofs    */
195  | 	internal->video_page	 = 0;		/* Current Video Page	      */
196  | 	internal->visible_cursor = TRUE;	/* Assume that it is visible  */
197  | 	internal->cursor		 = v_get_cursor_mode();
198  | 	internal->adapter		 = v_query_adapter_type();
199  | 	internal->font			 = v_get_font();
200  | 	internal->lines			 = v_get_rows();
201  | 	internal->cols			 = v_get_columns();
202  | 	internal->audible		 = TRUE;
203  | 	internal->visibility	 = 1;
204  | 	return( OK );
205  | }
206  |
